iecc_sermon_output_conventions.goal: Generate sermon pages that reuse IECC shared CSS/JS (no huge inline <style>/<script>).

preferred_initialization.data_attribute: Add data-sermon-date="YYYY-MM-DD" on a top-level element (e.g., <body> or a wrapper) so shared JS can auto-init.
preferred_initialization.tags_loader:
Ensure there is a
in the hero, and tags are loaded from sermons_data.json by sermon date.
preferred_initialization.tabs_routing: Tabs must use data-tab attributes matching section IDs; URL hash routing must work (back/forward supported).

inline_policy.css: Only tiny per-page overrides inline (aim < 50 lines). If more, extend the appropriate theme file under iecc/css/.
inline_policy.js: Only tiny per-page bootstrapping inline (e.g., one init call). Put shared logic in iecc/js/iecc-common.js.

bible.long_passages: Excerpt most relevant portions, provide reference for full text

theological_content.quotes: Include all biblical references, theological quotes with proper attribution
theological_content.doctrine: Maintain theological accuracy, note different interpretations when relevant
theological_content.application: Balance doctrinal teaching with practical application

spiritual_language.tone: Reverent but accessible, avoid overly academic or informal extremes

recommended_archetypes: Classic Theological - Traditional serif, gold/deep red/navy palette, centered layouts, divider ornaments
Modern Organic - Soft border-radius, pastel palette, serif headings, paper textures, for contemporary feel
Contextual Wildcard - Design matching sermon's specific metaphor (e.g., Garden theme for 'Soul Garden' series)

tabs: **Contextual Tab**: If content has unique structure (e.g., 'Historical Context', 'Greek Word Study', 'Prayer Points', 'Misconceptions'), create custom tab

bible_verse_card.format: Distinct styling with book/chapter/verse reference prominently displayed
bible_verse_card.text_style: Serif font, italics, larger line-height for readability

reflection_questions.format: Thought-provoking questions for personal or small group discussion

tags.placement: After date/speaker metadata, before navigation buttons
tags.source: Load from sermons_data.json using sermon date
tags.format: Clickable badges with emoji and label
tags.navigation: Each tag links to index.html?tags=tag-id (e.g., index.html?tags=soul-garden,holiness)
tags.styling: Color-coded by type: series (purple/gold), theme (red/wine), topic (green), scripture (yellow/amber)
tags.behavior: Hover effects, smooth transitions, matches page design system

main_sermon_section.format: Use headings, subheadings, highlight boxes for emphasis

bible_verses_section.format: All verses quoted in sermon, each in dedicated verse card
bible_verses_section.include_context: Brief notes on why verse is significant to sermon

application_section.focus: Practical steps for living out the teaching
application_section.format: Action items, examples, guidance for implementation

content: Challenge or action step for the week
